text: Hans-Joachim Burba (born August 15, 1957) is a former German curler. He is a former World men's runner-up (), European men's curling champion () and German men's curling champion (1992; bronze in 2015).Curling - Deutsche Meisterschaften His brother Wolfgang Burba is a former curler and curling coach, he was Hans-Joachim's longtime teammate. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" width=60| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second ! scope="col"| Lead ! scope="col"| Alternate ! scope="col"| Coach ! scope="col"| Events |- ! scope="row"| 1978–79 | Roland Jentsch || Hans-Joachim Burba || Wolfgang Burba || Werner Kolb || || || (10th) |- ! scope="row"| 1985–86 | Rodger Gustaf Schmidt || Wolfgang Burba || Johnny Jahr || Hans-Joachim Burba || || || WCC CR 1985 |- ! scope="row"| 1986–87 | Rodger Gustaf Schmidt || Wolfgang Burba || Johnny Jahr || Hans-Joachim Burba || || || |- ! scope="row"| 1991–92 | Rodger Gustaf Schmidt || Wolfgang Burba || Hans-Joachim Burba || Bernhard Mayr || Martin Beiser || || GMCC 1992 (9th) |- ! scope="row"| 2013–14 | Marc Muskatewitz || Kevin Bold || Mike Burba || Cristoph Schmidt || Hans-Joachim Burba || || GMCC 2014 (4th) |- ! scope="row"| 2014–15 | Wolfgang Burba || Hans-Joachim Burba || Mike Burba || Cristoph Schmidt || || || GMCC 2015 |- ! scope="row"| 2015 | Wolfgang Burba || Hans-Joachim Burba || Christoph Möckel || Matthias Steiner || || Anna Terekhova || WSCC 2015 (13th) |- ! scope="row"| 2017 | Uwe Saile || Hans- Joachim Burba || Christoph Möckel || Jürgen Münch || || Alexander Forsyth || WSCC 2017 (4th) |- ! scope="row"| 2019 | Uwe Saile || Hans-Joachim Burba || Christoph Möckel || Rüdiger Kühlwein || || Alexander Forsyth || WSCC 2019 (9th) |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:German male curlers Category:European curling champions Category:German curling champions
